Text: thanks. it is amazing you find this stuff. keep up the good work.. you must make many people extremely happy.

Hey STF was wondering if you could lend a helping hand. I finally got some good internet back and I have hundreds of issues of comics from the early 80's into the 90's I would like to scan and share. What dpi is a good setting? It seems no matter which one I choose on my scanner each image comes out to be over 10mb in size. Any suggestions? jpg, png?!? Thank You :D

wetbeak, you're welcome.

rackmeup420, please please please download and read this. it will provide info a thousand times more useful than anything i could write.
